course_title: Advanced Projects in the Visual Arts: Personal Narrative
course_description: This advanced video class serves goes into greater depth on the topics covered in {{% resource_link "835185ca-0f4d-4d61-884d-ab9c8f121b0c" "4.351 Introduction to Video" %}}. It also will explore the nature and function of narrative in cinema and video through exercises and screenings culminating in a final project. Starting with a brief introduction to the basic principles of classical narrative cinema, we will proceed to explore strategies designed to test the elements of narrative: story trajectory, character development, verisimilitude, time-space continuity, viewer identification, suspension of disbelief, and closure.
title: Course Metadata
